h2_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Locations
h3_title: Blood of the Iron Bull Location 9
content: The next material is in a chest on the right from the Fright Cliff \- Rockrest Flat Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge. Directly on your right from the Shrine, you can find an enemy up the stairs here as well as a chest. The chest has the Blood of the Iron Bull.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md', within the main section titled 'Blood of the Iron Bull', specifically from the subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Locations' and the sub-subsection 'Blood of the Iron Bull Location 9'.
The content is as follows:
The next material is in a chest on the right from the Fright Cliff \- Rockrest Flat Shrine in Yellow Wind Ridge. Directly on your right from the Shrine, you can find an enemy up the stairs here as well as a chest. The chest has the Blood of the Iron Bull.
